text.sentence: No, I haven't met Matt, in fact, I don't know much about him.
I would be happy to help in whatever way I can.
As you know, we've recently revised our forms, so this would be a good time to get him indoctrinated.
I will, of course, be sad to have you leave us.
You have been wonderful to work with from both a personal and professional standpoin.
Your baby's gain in your time is a loss to Enron, because are a most valued asset to our company.
I hope our lives will cross again some time!
Best wishes for your future, you deserve the best!
